}}'''Zuri''' is one of the nine [[Skin#Default skins|default]] skins [[player]]s can use in ''[[Minecraft]]'', and the seventh to be introduced. First appearing as a forager in [[Introducing New Default Skins!|''Introducing New Default Skins!'']], Zuri has become a major mascot of the brand, appearing in promotional material for updates such as [[Spring to Life]] and [[Trails & Tales]].

== Appearance ==
Zuri is typically depicted with wide arms, dark brown skin, and short black hair in a buzzcut. Their eyes are dark brown, lips cordovan, and possess noticeable cheekbones or a blush. Zuri's shirt is red polo, with white cuffs and hiked up, light brown trousers resembling khakis.

In the [[Character Creator|character creator]], Zuri has approximately five unique items.
